page.title: 15Windsor High, Halesowen
page.content: My present school is Windsor High. It is situated in Richmond Street. There are about 900 pupils and 68 teachers. Halesowen Schools have changed during the last two years. Originally this school was called the Richmond High School for Boys. It has combined with the Walton High School for Girls and now has pupils aged from 11 to 16. At the moment the school is having a lot of new buildings. A new gym, creative studies block, lecture theatre and an all-weather pitch. The school puts on a lot of activities like hill climbing, pony trekking and indoor tennis, and trips such as one to France that has just taken place. Some of these have been recently affected by teachers strikes.
